mapper.resultMap: <#list models as model> <#if model.id==true><id column="${model.column}" jdbcType="<#if model.simpleType=='Long'>BIGINT</#if><#if model.simpleType=='String'>VARCHAR</#if><#if model.simpleType=='Integer'>INTEGER</#if><#if model.simpleType=='Date'>TIMESTAMP</#if>" property="${model.name}"/></#if> <#if model.id==false><result column="${model.column}" jdbcType="<#if model.simpleType=='Long'>BIGINT</#if><#if model.simpleType=='String'>VARCHAR</#if><#if model.simpleType=='Integer'>INTEGER</#if><#if model.simpleType=='Date'>TIMESTAMP</#if>" property="${model.name}"/></#if> </#list>
